show.title: இறப்பதற்கு 24 மணி நேரம்
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/3mzfBa
show.description: A psychotic killer meticulously recreates murders from a popular crime novel, leaving detectives racing to decipher the connection. The reason behind his deadly game unfolds into a heart-pounding thriller with a shocking twist.
show.description_secondary: A psychotic killer meticulously recreates murders from a popular crime novel, leaving detectives racing to decipher the connection. The reason behind his deadly game unfolds into a heart-pounding thriller with a shocking twist.
